description:
Hello guys and gals, it's me Mutahar again! This time we take a look at a situation where 20 years worth of modding is at risk if it's anywhere near Nintendo related due to a new campaign by the legal team at Nintendo of America. Garry's Mod is a gaming icon and the modding community runs deep in relation to it and currently a mass takedown of mods are occuring if they feature any Nintendo made asset. Thanks for watching!
Like, Comment and Subscribe for more videos!
title: Yes, Nintendo Is Copyright Striking Garry's Mod...

description:
Hello guys and gals, it's me Mutahar again! For the last few months me and Coffeezilla have been investigating a story regarding Omnia media, a prominent YouTube MCN with rumours of bankruptcy. This story connected us with several high profile creators who have unfortunately been caught in a situation where their money is held back with nearly no recourse. Thanks for watching!
Like, Comment and Subscribe for more videos!
title: This Company Is Hurting YouTubers...
